room_title: Escape room "The Quest for the King's Crown" by Bangor Escape Rooms in Bangor
room_description: You and your team has been offered a job at an neighboring kingdom with better pay and more benefits. To prove your worth you must steal the king’s crown. As servants, you have spent weeks snooping around the castle looking for the hidden crown and have finally narrowed down it’s location. The Knights are out jousting and will return at dusk, which is only an hour away. Once the crown is in your possession you must flee the kingdom or risk being imprisoned in the dungeon. Or worse. Be Turned into a frog!
